name: Magenta (Elfara)
description:
Magenta is a roguelike top-down shooter that requires you to get upgrades to survive. Each round you can choose between 3 of your available upgrades. The more you play, the more upgrades your character will be able to have. Try to survive the most amount of waves and unlock all possible upgrades.

This game was made with unreal engine 4 by myself in around 6 month.
